revised_title: Preliminary Wind Tunnel Testing for Environmental Conditions of Liverpool Civic and Social Centre
tldr: This article discusses a series of preliminary wind tunnel tests conducted on a model of the proposed Liverpool Civic and Social Centre. The tests aimed to investigate the wind patterns around the building and their impact on pedestrians. The findings provide a guide for further detailed testing as the design progresses, focusing on aspects such as gusts, turbulence, and smoke plume direction.
